title: Annual reports
context: ยง342B-7 Annual reports. The department shall compile an annual report summarizing: (1) Air quality data from all air quality monitoring stations; (2) Annual criteria pollutant emissions; (3) Annual air toxic emissions; and (4) All completed or issued enforcement actions. [L 1992, c 240, pt of ยง1; am L 1993, c 208, ยง3]
